workshoptitle: Loading, Indexing and Querying JSON Data

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Upload Files to Object Storage
tutorials.description: Create a bucket in Object Storage and transfer local files

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Loading from Object Storage
tutorials.description: In SQL Developer Web, use DBMS_CLOUD.COPY_DATA to load database from Object Storage

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Creating Indexes and Basic Queries
tutorials.description: Create functional and search indexes on JSON data, and run queries against it

tutorials.title: Lab 4: RESTful Queries Through Oracle Application Express
tutorials.description: Use Oracle Application Express to create a RESTful API over JSON queries

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
